name: Battle Arena: Euro Wars
description:
Battle Arena: Euro Wars is a turn-based action/strategy game that presents a small episode of the conflict between forces of Unity and Commune on the streets of 3 europeans locations.


Game features:

- 3 maps.
- 4 mission type: capture the flag, leader hunting, get points, kill them all.
- Turn based gameplay in the form of a street fight.
- Single player, offline.
- Two teams.
- 14 characters.
- In-game achievements.
